title: Duke, it's ZeroHour
author: ZeroHour Software
description:
Duke It's Zero Hour is a total conversion for Duke Nukem 3D. 
The project was developed by ZeroHour Software and released on November 1, 1997.
It features new levels, weapons, enemies, music, sound effects, and even an original boss.

Not to be confused with Duke Nukem: Zero Hour.
